# imgpreppr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of imgpreppr is to make images play nice with blogdown based websites. These functions are for private use only.

## Installation

You can install the released version of imgpreppr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("imgpreppr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(imgpreppr)
## basic example code
```
